content:
Have a draft for extension to support witness to medication administration
http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base/StructureDefinition-medication-administration-witness.html
is this something that could be useful as a core extension? do others have requirements like this?
Not sure but I think in the US a second clinician is required to verify administration of a controlled substance; maybe that's a use case for this?
@Brett Esler , I suggest that you add a tracker item for this and Pharmacy will consider if this should be a core extension or perhaps even added to the core spec. Thanks
